name: Battle Board
description:
Battle Board is a board game, like chess, but the game pieces have abilities, other movements and you can choose 16 pieces to do your own "deck" to play. The game was inspired by TCG titles like Magic: The Gathering.

* This is a project for the future, a game that I would like to be able to do at some point, this is just a PDF with the idea of the game, nothing to play, but I would like you to analyze the idea of the game carefully, because I made it with much dedication, I hope you like it! AN ALPHA VERSION WILL BE LAUNCHED HERE ABOUT 2/3 MONTHS, THIS VERSION HAS ONLY ONE BATTLE, ONE AI, AND A DECK EDITOR!
